notes: Data include the employed, civilian, non-institutionalized population ages 16–75 and exclude those currently enrolled in primary or secondary school.
sources: Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS), 1-Year Public-Use File, 2021, data as of October 2022.Science and Engineering Indicators
